src:
SEMA Show 2019: Modifikasi Garang Nissan Navara Pakai Mesin V8
06 Nov 2019, 06:33 by Wira Utama, Wawan Priyanto
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Nissan Frontier atau Navara modifikasi ini menggunakan mesin V8 dari Nissan Titan, plus turbo. Modifikasi mobil pikap double cab ini mengusung konsep Desert Runner dan mejeng hadir di SEMA Show 2019.
Seperti dilansir dari Motor1, mobil ini hadir sebagai versi off-road kokoh. Modifikasi ini dikerjakan oleh MA Motorsports dan tim Nissan Motorsports.
Tak tanggung-tanggung, ubahannya mencakup mesin. Ya, mobil ini menggunakan mesin V8 5,6 liter milik Nissan Titan. Selain itu, mesin uga disematkan turbocharger Garrett dan intercooler khusus. Isi mesin jjuga dirombak, camshafts baru, piston, dan katup.
Header dan knalpot khusus juga ditingkatkan demi mendapatkan tenaga yang lebih. Nissan sendiri memperkirakan output mesin ini bisa mencapai 600 hp dan torsi 949 Nm dengan transmisi manual enam percepatan.
Untuk kenyamanan mengarungi medan offroad, Nissan Frontier Navara ini menggunnakan suspensi triple-bypass dan coilover dari King Racing. Di bagian belakang, menggunakan King Racing triple-bypas dan ban BFGoodrich dengan velg Baja T/A 37 inci. Selain itu, light bars besar juga tersedia di depan yang berfungsi sebagai pelat khusus untuk melindungi komponen mesin.
Secara penampilan, mobil pikap ini menampilkan bumper yang telah direvisi pada kedua ujungnya serta menggunakan fender baru. Di belakang, ada kustom untuk roda belakang cadangan. Interior tweak cukup kecil. Lantai mendapat lapisan khusus dan tersedia kursi balap.
Mobil ini akan menjadi daya tarik tersendiri bagi penggemar kustom di SEMA Show 2019.
text:
SEMA Show 2019: Modified Nissan Fierce Navara Use V8 Engine
Nov 6 2019, 06:33 by Wira Utama, Wawan Priyanto
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - This modified Nissan Frontier or Navara uses a V8 engine from Nissan Titan, plus a turbo. Modification of this double cab pickup car carrying the concept of Desert Runner and mejeng present at the 2019 SEMA Show.
As reported by Motor1, this car comes as a sturdy off-road version. This modification was carried out by MA Motorsports and the Nissan Motorsports team.
Unmitigated, the changes include the engine. Yes, this car uses a 5.6 liter V8 engine owned by Nissan Titan. In addition, the engine is also fitted with a Garrett turbocharger and a special intercooler. The engine contents were also revamped, new camshafts, pistons and valves.
Special headers and mufflers are also upgraded to get more power. Nissan itself estimates that the engine's output can reach 600 hp and 949 Nm of torque with a six-speed manual transmission.
For the convenience of crossing the offroad terrain, this Nissan Frontier Navara uses a triple-bypass and coilover suspension from King Racing. At the rear, using King Racing triple-bypas and BFGoodrich tires with 37-inch T / A Steel wheels. In addition, large light bars are also available at the front that function as special plates to protect engine components.
In appearance, this pickup car features a revised bumper at both ends and uses a new fender. At the rear, there is a custom for the spare rear wheel. Interior tweaks are quite small. The floor has a special coating and racing seats are available.
This car will be the main attraction for custom fans at the 2019 SEMA Show.
